Title: Authorizes the commissioner of general services to transfer certain land to the Richmond Amateur Sports Association, Inc.
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of general services to transfer certain land to the Richmond Amateur Sports Association, Inc. for the purpose of providing recreational and sporting activities.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the commissioner of general services to transfer and convey certain unappropriated state land to the Richmond Amateur Sports Association, Inc.; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
